Articles.Content: 1142: Danny2462 in confinement, though some say he is in a state of superposition so he's still dangerous

1143: You see a seagull fly past the window. You find it interesting until you start questioning its origin and how it could have possibly flown so high up. After a few minutes, you decide that you imagined it.

Edited March 11, 2015 by mythbusters844
1144: you find a small circle made of hay. upon closer inspection you realize its a seagull nest
1145: you notice nothing, buy when you reach the stairs to the next floor, you hear a distinct ticking noise. Not wanting to think or find out what it is, you rush to the next floor.

1146: you find a large bomb. the timer display reads the following:

0:03.960

F1147: You made it in time from the last floor and realize the last floor you were just on was the roof, but, luckily, you see a partial open floor in jumping distance on the next building over!

(I think we lost the one sentence per floor rules!! ><)

(Edit: notice this one means the floor is going to repeat 1147 again. rule say nothing about the floor staying the same. And why do people completely ignore even the last posting... sigh!)

Edited March 12, 2015 by Arugela

1148: The building starts swaying violently. Furniture on this floor moves around and one of the pieces hits you, sending you to the other wall. You try to stand up, but are unable to do so due to the motion of the floor. You crawl out of the floor, when suddenly the shaking stops.
1149: You see a bunch of gulls, upon closer inspection, the gulls have an extraterrestrial origin, explaining how high they managed to reach.
1150: you see a large bathroom. it is rusty. you move on to the next floor
1151: you start contemplating why you are climbing so high.
1152: There seems to be some type of energy in the air, but you can't seem to describe it.
SCP 1153: SCP-1153's anomalous properties include causing subjects, now known as SCP-1153-1, to become agitated.
Floor 1153: Carnivorous Muffins with legs surround you.
Floor 1154: You suddenly realize who you really are... You are in a game on the KSP forums.

Floor 1155: You find a calculator and after discovering that you are now 2.18 miles up, ponder why the air isn't beginning to thin...

P.S. 11:55 is my favorite time too

Edited March 15, 2015 by Avera9eJoe

1156: You see Mickey Mouse and he says hi to you.

Edited March 19, 2015 by mythbusters844

(it is only one floor at a time)

so, 1157: you see master yoda fighting the emporer inside of jabba's palace. you keep going.
1158: you find an airlock. you go on to the next floor wondering who put an airlock there
1159: you find an EVA suit in the airlock and you find no gravity, so you rcs pack to the next floor
1160: Gravity comes back... twice as strong, so you crawl to the the next floor.
1161: A refrigerator blocks the entrance.
1162: A small man with a purple hat hands you a tuna sandwich, but it tastes like calamari...
1163: The room loses gravity as soon as you look towards the stairs up to the next floor.
Floor 1164: Antigravity catapults you up to the next floor.
1165: This room is filled with inactive drones from the movie Oblivion.
